General.Name: Luoyang Xinqianglian Slewing Bearin
General.Description: Luoyang Xinqianglian Slewing Bearing Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells slewing bearings, shrink discs, and industrial forgings in China and internationally. The company offers single row tapered, triple-row, and double-row tapered roller main bearings, as well as individual triple-row roller pitch bearings and yaw bearings for wind turbine generators; tunnel boring machine main bearings; drive plates; large size slewing bearing for floating crane; and slewing bearing for ferris wheel. It also engages in the photovoltaic and wind power generation business. Luoyang Xinqianglian Slewing Bearing Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Luoyang, China.
